metadata.title: CVE-2022-1270 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In GraphicsMagick, a heap buffer overflow was found when parsing MIFF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1').
